thread.title: Hands-on with Nvidia’s new 4K HDR-streaming Shield with Android TV
thread.title_full: Hands-on with Nvidia’s new 4K HDR-streaming Shield with Android TV

author: Pollyanna
title: Hands-on with Nvidia’s new 4K HDR-streaming Shield with Android TV
text:
By Darrell Etherington 
Nvidia’s Shield set-top streaming device got an update at this year’s CES, and it was a big one: The new hardware is 40 percent smaller than the original, with a new Android 7.0 Nougat-based operating system, and a redesigned UI that groups games together and just generally organizes things a bit more logically. It also handles 4K HDR content streaming, and boasts the most… Read More
